author: eggbert20
title: Great small Technic set.....
review: This set was an excellent find back in the day. I believe I got this in 1995 when it was first released. This was one of my first forays into the world of Lego Technic. It was fun to put together, and I absolutely loved the (not-so-mini)figure that was included. If you can find this set today, don't hesitate to pick it up. It was alot of fun then, and is still fun today.

author: YeahYeahYouWere
title: Good Things Come In Small Packages!
review:
I LOVED this set.  It could be one of my all-time favorite Technic sets.  It came with two working functions, steering and piston engine, which as always is a delight in a small set.  It also included a figure which provided me with hours of fun outside of the set.

Perhaps what I like best about this set is the little added bits that show some attention to detail.  I love the side bars and the front push bar.  These easily could have been left out, but their inclusion shows they went a little bit further with this little set.

It was a quick and easy build/disassembly and a very enjoyable little set.
